nodes.text: Galo Thriven was a Human male from Thule who served as an elite commando in the military of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

A dark sider who supported the Confederacy's aim to reform the "archaic" Galactic Republic, Thriven led an elite unit of soldiers and successfully struck at vulnerable targets in the Republic during the Clone Wars. Though trained to evade capture, he and his team were prepared to kill themselves if captured alive to preserve Thule's status as a hidden Sith fortress world and Force nexus and prevent information about the planet from falling into the wrong hands.

As an elite soldier, Thriven wore a combat jumpsuit, armed himself with a blaster rifle and vibroblade, and carried a number of fragmentation grenades, detonite charges, electrobinoculars, and medpacs. Like many of the residents of Thule, he was fluent in both Galactic Basic Standard and the ancient Sith language.
